series.title: The Secret World Chronicle
series.author: Mercedes Lackey, Dennis Lee, and Cody Martin, with Larry Dixon and Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-26-Penny Saved, Hurricane: Storm Front
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Penny discovers the one ghost who might be able to help rather than harm. Meanwhile, Bella learns more about an ally turned enemy. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-25-Rubicon, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock will stop at nothing to save the one who calls him Beloved. But is it too late? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-24-Rubicon, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Hell hath no fury like one racing against time to save something heaven-sent. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-23-Beloved
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Sera goes on an errand to retrieve something for Red Saviour, but danger looms and something dear may be lost. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-22-Next to Normal, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Bella and Vickie rely on Mel in her new role as ECHO assistant, while Djinni starts to rely on Mel for something more. Written by Dennis Lee, Veronica Giguere, Mercedes Lackey, and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-21-Next to Normal, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: At Normality, Mel plays the good bartender with the 'regulars' and learns a little more about Red Djinni. Djinni learns a little more about Mel, too. Written by Dennis Lee, Veronica Giguere, Mercedes Lackey, and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-20-Eskimo
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Ramona figures that she has the best chance to argue for Metis to aid ECHO as the Thulian threat looms closer to home. Bella agrees, so it's time for Steel Maiden to take a little trip. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-19-Cover Girl
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Bella and Spin Doctor turn the tables on Ramona and Red Saviour to put out some new propaganda for ECHO and CCCP and pique the curiosity of their enemies. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-18-Hole Heart, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John and Sera are caught in the thick of the fight, but there will be burritos to follow. John admits to hearing... things.  Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-17-Hole Heart, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John and Sera are sent out together on patrol to face down a Thulian cell. In the aftermath, they discuss the merits of burritos and other complex ideas.  Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-16-Dead Meat, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock and Sera fight together against those who would threaten JM and the CCCP. The aftermath brings some new revelations.  Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-15-Dead Meat, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The duty roster sends John Murdock and Sera out on a call, but something is lying in wait for ol' JM.  Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-14-Wounds
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock finishes a little light reading. He seeks out Sera to answer some questions they have about what was, and what might be.  Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-13-Danger Zone, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The metahumans of Atlanta prove their mettle against the Thulian threat, but the moments after the battle are the most telling for the victors. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, Dennis Lee, and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-12-Danger Zone, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: In the heat of the battle, our heroes rise to the challenge. With the help of Overwatch, Atlanta might be able to stand against the Thulian threat. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, Dennis Lee, and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-11-Danger Zone, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Just when it seems like everything is getting back to some bit of normalcy, evil rises from the rubble and forces the metahumans of Atlanta to defend their city. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, Dennis Lee, and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-10-Hurricane: Storm Flags Flying
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Scope is back in Top Hold, reliving her past with the help of an old teammate. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-09-Man in the Mirror
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: A new hangout for the metahumans of ECHO and CCCP provides a backdrop for old friends, new allies, and the ever-entertaining Soviet Bear. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Dennis Lee, Cody Martin, and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-08-Penny: Tarnished
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Penny and the rest of the children have a new cellmate, but this one is no child. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-07-Holding On
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Ramona has a heart to heart with the Seraphym on the rooftop of the CCCP HQ. While not quite a shoulder to cry on, Ramona does provide some insight about the benefits of Free Will. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-06-Hurricane: Storm Warning
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Scope hasn't been the same since that last battle in the MARTA tunnels. Bella and Bulwark try a dangerous last resort to get her back as a part of the team. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-05-Secrets
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie uses a little mathemagic to help John Murdock realize who he was and who he is. In spite of his humble protests, Johnny is not a simple man by any stretch of the imagination. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-04-Here With Me
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The Seraphym - now Sera - can no longer hear the song of her siblings. Vickie, Bella, and Natalya must bring her into the fold. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-03-Don't Run Our Hearts Around, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Charged with the education of John Murdock, it's up to Vickie to use technology, magic, and common sense to help him learn about the past eight years of his life with the CCCP. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-02-Don't Run Our Hearts Around, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The CCCP discovers a bewildered John Murdock in the middle of the breakroom. Unfortunately, he is not altogether there, in both the best and worst of ways. What's a Commissar, a CEO, and a technoshaman to do? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book8-01-Prologue: Penny
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: We begin the eighth season of Secret World Chronicle with a new perspective, beginning in a very dark place. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-19-Where There Is Light
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With the Seraphym at his bedside, John Murdock has one last sunrise. Then, he must make his choice. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-18-Fire On The Mountain, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The combined forces of Echo and CCCP make the final push to cripple the Thulians, and our heroes are pushed to the brink. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-17-Fire On The Mountain, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Every person has their part in the overthrow of the Thulians, with Victoria Victrix conducting the tactical symphony at breakneck speed. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-16-Fire On The Mountain, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Our heroes have their miracle. It's time to take the fight to the heart of the Thulian stronghold. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-15-Running Up That Hill
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock is running out of time, and the Seraphym seeks to help him trust in something greater than death. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-14-Testament
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The new CEO of Echo is voted in. With great responsibility comes great tears and staggering self-doubt. Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-13-Descent Part 5
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Our heroes make their sacrifices to drive Verdigris back, reclaiming the organization championed by Tesla. Beware the Ides of March. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-12-Descent Part 4
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: It's the Misfits versus Blacksnake, but there is no victory without loss. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-11-Descent Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: It's time for the CCCP and the Misfits to take the fight to Blacksnake, but not without great cost.  Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-10-Descent Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Overwatch is coordinating the response to Verdigris' surprise. The CCCP is ready to assist, as well as some old friends.  Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-09-Descent Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: To commemorate the anniversary of the Invasion, Verdigris has planned something big. It's up to the heroes of Echo and CCCP to be ready. Written by Mercedes Lackey, Cody Martin, and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-08-Here With Me
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock receives news about his deteriorating condition and chooses what to make of his future. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-07-Save Me
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John gets another brief yet blissful evening encounter with the Seraphym. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-06-You're Only Human
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: As the only non-meta in Echo's inner circle, Ramona Ferrari is an easy target for Verdigris' wrath. Written by Veronica Giguere and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-05-Kingdom
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: In an opulent secret lair, Verdigris plots against those in Echo who are becoming a nuisance. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-04-Heart Like A Wheel
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The Commissar has learned of the General's deception. She sends Comrade Murdock on a deadly errand; although he doesn't like the orders, he knows that Shen Xue is a threat to the CCCP, ECHO, and their efforts against the Thulians. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-03-Heaven Beside You
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Verdigris sends the General Shen Xue on a mission of great importance; engage an Instrument of the Infinite. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-02-Enemy Mine, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock faces... well, if ol' JM ever thought he'd have a nemesis, this might be the sort he'd talk about over a beer. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book7-01-Enemy Mine, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Moving on some key information about the Thulians, the CCCP take the fight outside of Atlanta. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-AscendantTribute-SpecialEpisode
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: This story originally appeared as part of the City of Stories podcast, presented by Mint Condition, in 2006. We don't claim any ownership of the story or place it within the SWC 'verse or canon... we just offer it as a way to share the legacy of Tre Chipman, Ascendant. Originally broadcast as part of City of Stories, Issue 3.

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-28-You Have to Believe We Are Magic
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Circumstances force Ramona and Vickie to plan the unlocking of the charter. Time to sell bikinis to Eskimos. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-27-Mother Knows Best
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Yankee Pride and Ramona Ferrari consult with Tesla to find out how to keep Verdigris at bay, and realize that the solution is closer than they thought. Written and read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-26-Leap Into the Wind
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Bella gives Bulwark a post-Harmony checkup. Is it a housecall when your patient comes to see you? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-25-Resolution
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie creates a mathemagical masterpiece, and Red Djinni gets invited for a drink. Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-24-Terminal
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Dominic Verdigris has a surprise for the ECHO ops, and those in the trenches must work with Overwatch to stay a step ahead. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-23-Brothers in Blood, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The cavalry arrives! Our villain is faced with an unlikely trio of rescuers, while Vickie employs some very special language when speaking to the Djinni. Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-22-Brothers in Blood, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With Djinni in a special kind of trouble, Vickie can only sit by and listen as they figure out how to get him out of THIS one. And why is Bulwark being so bullish? Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-21-Brothers in Blood, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With Bulwark back, Djinni is forced to find new ways to amuse himself... aside from taking cheap shots at the big guy.  Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-20-Bedlam Ballroom, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: When the intel is right, there are to be explosions. Many explosions. Afterwards, there are waffles. Horosho. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-19-Bedlam Ballroom, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Red Saviour looks to an unlikely source for intel on the Thulians. And look, there is being Waffle House. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-18-Permitted, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Two women walk out on the Djinni, but one woman gives him the opportunity to choose his future. Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-17-Permitted, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Bella works to heal the Djinni, but she remains torn as to where she stands with him, and Vickie's accidental eavesdropping doesn't help. Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-16-Smoke and Mirrors, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Who is left to save whom? Has the fire claimed both Vickie and the Djinni? Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-15-Smoke and Mirrors, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Negotiation and rescue don't go as planned for Victrix and Djinni. Less Butch and Sundance, more Reservoir Dogs. Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-14-Smoke and Mirrors, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie and Djinni swap stories about their respective run-ins with magic, fire, and loss as they wait for Blacksnake to begin a deadly trade with the Rebs. Written by Dennis Lee and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-13-In One Ear
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: It's official; Bella Dawn Parker is the new head of Echo Med. Now, how to break it to everyone? Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-12-The Seven Deadly Virtues
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: It's Verd's party, but Khanjar doesn't seem to want to celebrate, leaving Verdigris to contemplate his next move using her as well as People's Blade. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-11-Leap of Faith
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Neither John Murdock nor the Seraphym were accustomed to second-guessing decisions. At least, until that afternoon on the roof. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-10-Obsessions
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Dominic Verdigris has a one-track mind, especially when it comes to understanding the futures. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-09-Run Through the Jungle, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The Seraphym learns of the situation that sent John Murdock away from the Program and on his current path. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-08-Run Through the Jungle, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock shares a sample of Atlanta's finest takeout with the Seraphym, and winds up telling her about the Program. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-07-Chasing Shadows
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Verdigris sends the General on an errand as a test for a larger plan. Needless to say, the General is not amused by the barbarian's games. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-06-Hole-Hearted, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie clings to the thread that ties her to the physical world in the hope that she and Djinni can undo Harmony's damage to Bulwark. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-05-Hole-Hearted, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Magic may be the only way to save Bulwark, but will it work if Djinni holds the frayed end of Vickie's rope as she leaps into the void? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-04-Hole-Hearted, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The combined efforts of Echo's medics and CCCP's best doctors may not be enough to save Bulwark. At least, not without a little magic. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-03-Dare to Be Stupid
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The Commissar places Comrade Murdock in charge of a mission in Kansas City, with the added challenge of Soviet Bear. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-02-Stone Cold
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The enemy of Verdigris' enemy may be a necessity for the new head of ECHO, but one would not call the General a 'friend.' Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book6-01-Killing Time
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: In pursuit of Harmony, Scope and Bruno seem to exhaust all options, until an old friend discovers them. Written by Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-07-The Journal of John Murdock, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With Overwatch in his ear, John Murdock reflects upon the events and circumstances that made him a wanted man. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-06-The Journal of John Murdock, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With Overwatch in his ear, John Murdock reflects upon the events and circumstances that made him a wanted man. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-05-For Those About to Rock, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie tells the Djinni a little more about mages and Elementals via Overwatch on special assignment. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-04-For Those About to Rock, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie tells the Djinni a little more about mages and Elementals via Overwatch on special assignment. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-03-Running on Empty
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Rick, aka Mercurye, is stuck spinning his wheels in Metis with naught but reruns to keep him company. *This is a rewrite of Mercurye in Metis from Book Three to better align with the print series.* Written by Veronica Giguere and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-02-Night and Gold
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: When it is permitted, the Seraphym is not only a creature of mercy, but one of terrible justice. Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book5-01-Aces and Eights
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Handsome Devil must play the hand he is dealt, and his teammates must endure the consequences. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-23-Roll the Bones
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With the aid of Vickie in her role as Overwatch, John Murdock travels to the wilds outside Kansas City and infiltrates a Thulian stronghold. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-22-Heroes and Thieves
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With the Metis communicator hidden in CCCP HQ, can Vickie crack it--and if she does, will Metis answer when the heroes call? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-21-Illusion, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: For Djinni, it's all broken glass and the attempt to take back what was said. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-20-Illusion, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Djinni's temper has often cost him dearly in the past.  But now, it will cost Vickie everything. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-19-Suffer, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Vickie and Djinni uncover secrets about each other that will change everything. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-18-Suffer, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: With everything going wrong, Djinni makes a decision he is sure he will regret. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-17-Suffer, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: At all costs, the Metis communicator must be retrieved before Verdigris discovers its existence.  With Bulwark out, it's up to Red Djinni to plan the caper. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-16-Boulevard of Broken Dreams, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Bella gets some unexpected advice from an unanticipated source, and the course of her future changes yet again. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-15-Boulevard of Broken Dreams, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: In hiding at CCCP HQ, Bella tries to decide the course of her future--remain with Echo, or join the CCCP? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-14-Boulevard of Broken Dreams, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Confronted by the changing of the guard and the terrifying new head of Echo, Vickie and Bella seek the help of John Murdock and the CCCP. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-13-Precipice, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: An unforeseen proposal of cooperation is trumped by an even larger betrayal. After this, Echo will never be the same. Written by Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-12-Precipice, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Alex Tesla watches as the future of Echo disappears in the hands of some unknown shareholder. And then, Blacksnake comes calling. Written by Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-11-Precipice, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Red Djinni and Bulwark put the rest of the Misfits through their paces with robot zombie tag. All goes as can be expected, until an old friend shows up to make things right. Written by Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-10-Total Eclipse of the Heart, Part 5
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Yankee Pride steps up to face the remaining Kriegers, with the support of the Misfits and the CCCP. The rest of the trash is taken out, and Detective Ferrari swears off tater tots for the rest of her life. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-09-Total Eclipse of the Heart, Part 4
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The action heats up - literally - as the team races to defend Alex Tesla from the onslaught at Mama Lou's Diner. Worse, the so-called 'janitor' wants to clean up any evidence that might remain. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-08-Total Eclipse of the Heart, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Echo mobilizes with the aid of Project Overwatch, and Yankee Pride learns firsthand about the support that the CCCP has provided post-Invasion. Detective Ferrari retreats with Tesla to the walk-in freezer to avoid some persistent Kriegers. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-07-Total Eclipse of the Heart, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Detective Ferrari and Yankee Pride confront Alex Tesla with the final report on the Mountain situation. With the help of Overwatch, Ramona takes her boss out for a quiet coffee, but things get dangerous as breakfast just gets started. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-06-Total Eclipse of the Heart, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Detective Ramona Ferrari meets up with Bella at the edge of the parkour course and discuss the changes in Echo, as well as their mutual discontent with their boss, Alex Tesla. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-05-Bad Moon Rising, Part 3
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock and the few remaining National Guard soldiers face the Nazis with help from an unexpected yet much appreciated source. Part three of three. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-04-Bad Moon Rising, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: John Murdock and a small group from the National Guard are pitted against the Nazis in the Georgia swamps. Without communication with CCCP or Echo, this proves to be a challenge that John isn't sure that he'll survive. Part two of three. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-03-Bad Moon Rising, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: The Commissar sends John Murdock to the Georgia swamps on an equipment errand. John finds a van full of spare parts... and a Death Sphere. Part one of three. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-02-Sleeping with the Enemy
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Khanjar provides an insightful look at Verdigris as he works to avoid the possible future shown to him by the Seraphym. An old associate returns as Verdigris looks to employ Blacksnake for his own purposes. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book4-01-Revelations
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: As Book Four opens, the Seraphym visits one who may yet play a role in shaping a future. Her presence, as well as his possible future, shake him to his very core. Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-26-Tales of the Secret World War: White Bird
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Meet La Faucon Blanc, France's greatest - and strangest - aviatrix. This is bonus material from Tales of the Secret World War, originally made available in 2007.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-25-Tales of the Secret World War: Navy Seal
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written and read by Veronica Giguere. In the chill depths of the Atlantic, the man they call Navy Seal must carry out his orders, despite the cost. This is bonus material from Tales of the Secret World War, originally made available in 2007.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-24-Tales of the Secret World War: Sgian Dubh
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. When his country comes calling, a wee Scotsman proves to be more than enough for the task: rescue Yankee Doodle and Dixie Belle! This is bonus material from Tales of the Secret World War, originally made available in 2007.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-23-Roll the Bones
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. With the aid of Vickie in her role as Overwatch, John Murdock travels to the wilds outside Kansas City and infiltrates a Thulian stronghold. This is the final story of Book 3: World Well Lost.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-22-Thunder in Heaven - Part Three
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. In the aftermath of the ambush, John comes to face his counterpart as well as the injustice of a miracle. The Seraphym discovers what she believes to be a friend.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-21-Thunder in Heaven - Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. In the destruction corridor on the outskirts of Atlanta, the CCCP and Echo are ambushed by the Rebs, who have found new and dangerous allies.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-20-Thunder in Heaven - Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock and Bella have a heart-to-heart, but are interrupted by a call in the destruction corridor. Soon, the CCCP must respond to support Echo in an increasingly dangerous situation.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-19-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Seven
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. The thrilling finale of this mini-epic within Book Three concludes with the team's reliance upon Vickie's magic as a known threat is willed upon them by a long-dead madman. Part seven of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-18-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Six
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. When one member of the team struggles, others rise to the occasion and prove their worth and survive. Vickie gets Overwatch online, but her only contact is Red Djinni. Part six of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-17-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Five
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. The team is cornered in the catacombs as Vickie works to reconnect with them. Some heroes become more than misfits while others remain paralyzed by fear. Part five of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-16-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Four
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere. As Vickie works to repair Overwatch and reconnect with the team, the group in the Golden Catacombs discovers a threat far bigger and older than they could have imagined. Part four of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-15-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Three
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere. Bulwark and his band of misfits venture deeper into the Golden Catacombs, with Vickie's Overwatch to guide them. In a labyrinth designed by a cold-blooded psychotic, each metahuman ability triggers a new challenge, and the effects nearly cost the team their lives. Part three of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-14-She Blinded Me With Science - Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere. In the Golden Catacombs, traps await the group at every turn while their own personal weaknesses become apparent to Bella. To make matters worse, Djinni refuses any sort of magic from Vickie to help them. Part two of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-13-She Blinded Me With Science - Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere. Research by the meta think-tank at Echo leads Alex Tesla to demand further investigation into the Golden Catacombs. He taps Bulwark's misfits, sending Belladonna Blue along with Victoria Victrix and the Red Djinni on a dangerous recon. Part one of seven.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-12-No Illusions
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Veronica Giguere. Read by Veronica Giguere. Having taken Bulwark's offer to rejoin Echo, Mel 'Reverie' Gautier finds herself the first recipient of Belladonna Blue's ever-growing ability to heal that which is so very broken.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-11-Dark Angel
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Belladonna Blue is awed by the choice of the Seraphym and her charge. The platypus is, indeed, a joke.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-10-Respect the Wind, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. After a hardly-routine patrol, John Murdock and Bella go nose to nose as to how to treat a Reb, and John has another conversation with the Seraphym.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-09-Respect the Wind, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock and the CCCP go on patrol in Atlanta and come face to face with an ugly and possibly deadly threat.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-08-Thunder Road
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Friends
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock goes out on recon for the CCCP, with Victoria Victrix Nagy in his ear for guidance.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-07-Moving Mountains, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Written by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Ramona Ferrari must use her rapport with The Mountain in order to carry out an Echo order that she finds nothing short of troubling.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-06-Moving Mountains, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Written by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Ramona Ferrari is pulled deeper into the ugly truths that Echo hides as the organization figures out how to deal with one of its biggest problems to date.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-05-Mercurye in Metis
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Written by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. In the city of Metis, nothing is what it appears to be. Mercurye finds out more than he could ever have imagined concerning Tesla family, and he learns a disturbing secret surrounding the Thulian attacks.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-04-Nowhere Fast
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock reveals more about his past in a move to join Red Saviour's team, but the interview is interrupted by a familiar foe.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-03-Every Breath You Take
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere. Victoria Victrix shows off her abilities as she assists the Red Djinni and Bulwark in an entirely new way as they seek out a contact in Atlantic City.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-02-Keeping Up Appearances
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: In New Orleans, Bulwark's contact for the Stone brothers gets a second chance to be part of Echo. Written and read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book3-01-Introduction: Watch Over Me
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary:
Introduction and Watch Over Me - Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere
The long-awaited third book of the Secret World Chronicle has begun! Two stories in one, our book opens with author and technomage Victoria Victrix Nagy. Watch Over Me returns to see John Murdock as he has started to find his niche in Atlanta under the watchful eye of the Seraphym.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-24-When Push Comes to Shove, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: The thrilling finale of the Secret World Chronicle Book Two! Written by Mercedes Lackey, Steve Libbey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-23-When Push Comes to Shove, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: The thrilling finale of the Secret World Chronicle Book Two! Written by Mercedes Lackey, Steve Libbey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-22-A Hard Rain is Gonna Fall, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: John Murdock's past catches up to him. Can he survive it? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-21-A Hard Rain is Gonna Fall, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: John Murdock's past catches up to him. Can he survive it? Written by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-20-The Mirage Returns, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: When Echo Director and retired metahuman Fata Morgana discovers a doom-laden prophecy left by a dead psychic, she thinks she has her work cut out for her -- until her boss tells her to track down the mysterious Meta Four, Dr. Dusk.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-19-The Mirage Returns, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: When Echo Director and retired metahuman Fata Morgana discovers a doom-laden prophecy left by a dead psychic, she thinks she has her work cut out for her -- until her boss tells her to track down the mysterious Meta Four, Dr. Dusk.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-18-Blackbird Fly
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Recluse Victoria Victrix, meet the Red Djinni....oh, and you'll be working together. This may be a match made in hell, but since you're going into voodoo country, that shouldn't matter. Written by Mercedes Lackey and Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-17-Head Hunters, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Head Hunters, Part Two by Dennis Lee with Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Old friends and enemies are not amused by Red Djinni's new job: Echo recruiter.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-16-Head Hunters, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Head Hunters, Part One by Dennis Lee with Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Old friends and enemies are not amused by Red Djinni's new job: Echo recruiter.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-15-Karma Chameleon
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Karma Chameleon by Mercedes Lackey and Cody Martin. Read by Veronica Giguere. Blacksnake has its eye on John Murdock, but so does the enigmatic Seraphym. One future will end, while others will prevail and continue.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-14-Working for a Living, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Working for a Living, Part Two by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Detective Ramona Ferrari goes on the hunt for Slycke, the only witness to Eisenfaust's final words.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-13-Working for a Living, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Working for a Living, Part One by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Detective Ramona Ferrari goes on the hunt for Slycke, the only witness to Eisenfaust's final words.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-12-Bad for Good
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Bad for Good by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Belladonna Blue discovers how hard it is to toe the line.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-11-Bombay the Hard Way, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Bombay the Hard Way, Part Two by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Verdigris travels to India to exploit the aftermath of the Nazi attack.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-10-Bombay the Hard Way, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Bombay the Hard Way, Part One by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Verdigris travels to India to exploit the aftermath of the Nazi attack.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-9-Hoods, Part Two
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Hoods, Part Two by Cody Martin and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock finds a place to call home in Atlanta.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-8-Hoods, Part One
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Hoods, Part One by Cody Martin and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. John Murdock finds a place to call home in Atlanta.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-7-Strike a Pose
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Strike a Pose by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Grappling with a public relations nightmare, Echo metahuman and PR man Spin Doctor concocts a scheme to win back a fickle public - and Belladonna Blue is his secret weapon!

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-6-Moving Day
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Moving Day by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Red Saviour and CCCP settle into their new home.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-5-Gravity, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Gravity by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Echo struggles to contain the chaos that has erupted in the aftermath of the attacks.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-4-Gravity, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Gravity by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Echo struggles to contain the chaos that has erupted in the aftermath of the attacks.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-3-Red, White and Blues, Part 2
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Red, White and Blues by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Red Saviour takes a tour of Atlanta with Belladonna Blue and VickieVee.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-2-Red, White and Blues, Part 1
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Red, White and Blues by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Red Saviour takes a tour of Atlanta with Belladonna Blue and VickieVee.

episodes.title: SWC-Book2-1-Verdigris
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Verdigris by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Book Two opens with a visit to the sunny island of Dominic Verdigris VIII, whose idyllic criminal lifestyle will soon crumble around him.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-8-Aftermath
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "Aftermath" by Mercedes Lackey, Steve Libbey, Cody Martin, Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-7-Fading Echoes
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "Fading Echoes" by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-6-Changing Faces
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "Changing Faces" by Dennis Lee. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-5-Blood in Red Square
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "Blood in Red Square" by Steve Libbey. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-4-On the Town
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "On the Town" by Cody Martin and Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-3-Fear and Loathing in Lost Wages
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "Fear and Loathing in Lost Wages" by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Also featuring "Interlude: Fire in the Sky" by Mercedes Lackey.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-2-The Luck of the Devil
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: "The Luck of the Devil" by Steve Libbey. Read by Adam Higgins.

episodes.title: SWC-Book1-1-Intro, Prologue and Atlanta Burning
episodes.author: Mercedes Lackey and Steve Libbey
episodes.summary: Intro by Mercedes Lackey. Read by Veronica Giguere. Prologue by Steve Libbey. Read by Adam Higgins. "Atlanta Burning" by Mercedes Lackey.
